channel.title: [REPORT] Utopia server is hacking [RAT] people! AMAZING EVIDENCE![REPORT]
channel.description:
The server Utopia is a virus.... Its a RAT. I found the owner and he told me about it.. the rat is in this..
C:/oldskoolpk/model/model.exe.
model.exe is a application file.. containing a rat... once he told me exactly what i was doing and told me what i said to my friend he was on target and correct.. i was doing those things on rs he hacked me....
i woke up the next day lost 540million rsgp... heres a screen shot he sent me of the ppl he ratted...
[IMG]http://i993.photobucket.com/albums/af52/Duckscape_SERVER/PIC29EF.jpg[/img]
The convo is just somthing he screen shotted while he showed me this... he showed me this because he was saying he didnt hack me and told me i wasnt on his list.... well i wasnt cause i got rid of the rat...
heres our convo....
In the convo where i say i might send a virus back or keylogger and where i said where do i get rat thing... i was luring him into admiting stuff... and the shit WORKED lol....
[IMG]http://i993.photobucket.com/albums/af52/Duckscape_SERVER/CONVO1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i993.photobucket.com/albums/af52/Duckscape_SERVER/convo2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i993.photobucket.com/albums/af52/Duckscape_SERVER/convo2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i993.photobucket.com/albums/af52/Duckscape_SERVER/CONVO4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i993.photobucket.com/albums/af52/Duckscape_SERVER/convo5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i993.photobucket.com/albums/af52/Duckscape_SERVER/CONVO6.png[/img]
I AM NOT ASKING FOR MY ITEMS BACK FROM PEOPLE, I JUST WANT THIS ASSHOLE TO BE REPORTED ON MOPARSCAPE AND ALL THE MAJOR RSPS SITES!
RAT people isnt fucking cool... its in his webclient.... his website is utopia-rsps.co.cc DO NOT VISIT IT because it automaticly takes you to his webclient..... do not download the cache..
HIS EMAIL IS [email]SAMUEL.CUMENIUS@LIVE.SE[/email]
Ban it from all the forums or his ip because this is bs... he ratted 22 people and counting.. theres alot of ppl that play that server because its pvp spawn server...
[COLOR="Red"][SIZE="6"]IF YOUR RATTED FROM PLAYING HIS SERVER!!!!!!!!! READ BELOW!!!![/SIZE][/COLOR]
THE "RAT" IS LOCATED, C:/oldskoolpk/model/model.exe THE MODEL.EXE APPLICATION IS THE RAT.. AND ITS AUTOMATICLY ON WHEN YOU LOAD THE WEBCLIENT.. IF YOU LOGGED IN HIS SERVER OR EVEN IF IT LOADED UP TO THE LOGIN PAGE THIS VIRUS IS TURNED ON... ITS UNDETECTABLE BY VIRUS SCANNERS.. EVEN MINE "NORTON, WINDOWS ESSENTIALS, AVG." DID NOT DETECT IT 1 BIT....

item.title: [REPORT] Utopia server is hacking [RAT] people! AMAZING EVIDENCE![REPORT]
item.dc:creator: @Generation317or562 Generation317or562
item.description:
@Generation317or562 wrote:

This is why I quit rsps. Too many skiddies hacking people for rsgp.

Not every server owner is a hacker, plus we have people like Tom, who makes sure hackers/scammers, are banned. Thanks Tom.

Read full topic
item.source: [REPORT] Utopia server is hacking [RAT] people! AMAZING EVIDENCE![REPORT]

item.title: [REPORT] Utopia server is hacking [RAT] people! AMAZING EVIDENCE![REPORT]
item.dc:creator: @Spencer4678 Spencer4678
item.description:
@Spencer4678 wrote:

Doesn’t surprise me. I was waiting for someone to do a Java Drive-by for a while, first time I’ve seen someone do it on a RSPS. Submit the model.exe to http://www.virustotal.com/. It submits data to most AV’s and the file won’t stay FUD for long if you submit it.

Also doesn’t surprise me that the skid is from HackForums. Lol…

Read full topic
